body_html:
Hi @Fabioluxx. By x86, do you mean Python running on Windows?

TensorFlow can be downloaded from pip in general. If you have pip installed, you should be able to download TensorFlow just fine by running pip install tensorflow regardless of platform.

Hope this helps.
body_text:
Hi @Fabioluxx. By x86, do you mean Python running on Windows?
TensorFlow can be downloaded from pip in general. If you have pip installed, you should be able to download TensorFlow just fine by running pip install tensorflow regardless of platform.
Hope this helps.
body:
Hi @Fabioluxx. By x86, do you mean Python running on Windows? 

TensorFlow can be downloaded from pip in general. If you have pip installed, you should be able to download TensorFlow just fine by running `pip install tensorflow` regardless of platform. 

Hope this helps.
